data.price: អល់ឡោះមហាសប្បុរស។
ទ្រង់បានបង្រៀនគម្ពីរគួរអាន(ដល់មនុស្សលោក)។

dua.name: Ayat al-Rahman
dua.significanceReason: Initiates the Surah of Mercy, profoundly emphasizing divine compassion, teaching, and the comprehensive nature of Allah's mercy.

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.
